title: Legacy issues behind us, PNB on right path to outperform its competition: MD Atul Kumar Goel
description: PNB, led by Atul Kumar Goel, achieved a 229% profit growth to Rs 8,245 crore in FY24. Initiatives like reducing NPAs, improving ROA, and expanding branches contribute to the bank's success.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
